deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
 account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
@dev Returns the address of the current owner.
@dev Returns the address of the pending owner.

@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
 @param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
@dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

arguments.value: TokenVestingFactory: token address must not be zero

arguments.value: TokenVesting: beneficiary address must not be zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TokenVesting: beneficiary address must not be zero"

documentation.text: @return TokenVesting details.
@return the initial share of the beneficiary.
@return the periodic share of the beneficiary.
@return the beneficiary of the tokens.
@return the start time of the token vesting.
@return the cliff time of the token vesting.
@return the total amount of the token.
@return the amount of the vested token.
@return the amount of the token released.
@return the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.
@return true if the vesting is revocable.
@return true if the token is revoked.
@return status.
@notice change status to initialized.
@notice update token vesting contract.
@notice Transfers vested tokens to beneficiary.

@notice Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested
 remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
@dev Calculates the amount that has already vested.

devdoc.details: The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control functions, this simplifies the implementation of "user permissions".

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
